objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Horror themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Horror narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Horror lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a frightening or supernatural situation involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to work and career in a horror context
Students engage in horror themed role-play about work and career using expert register
Students create original horror themed content about work and career in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Horror scenario?
What terror or darkness might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Horror story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Horror perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this horror scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Horror situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using expert register in horror context
Character B: Responding in expert register within horror theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Horror theme: Fear, suspense, supernatural elements

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Horror themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
